T02TD1345E:359b-1: ra ha s+ya a'a nanda ti la ka n'a ma /
T02TD1345E:359b-3: gsang chen dga' ba'i thig le zhes bya ba /
T02TD1345E:359b-4: bcom ldan 'das dpal padma las byung ba la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1345E:359b-5: 'gro ba'i nyon mongs sel mdzad padma las byung lha mo'i mchog gnyis dga' ba'i mgon //
T02TD1345E:359b-6: 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi mdzad khro bo'i rgyal po dga' byed thugs rje'i dgos //
T02TD1345E:359b-7: 'gro ba bde ba sbyin mdzad phongs pa thams cad skyob pa lha yi gtso bo mchog / srid gsum skyob 'os 'byor pa ma lus 'byung la rab tu dad pas phyag 'tshal lo //
T02TD1345E:360a-0: rdo rje theg pa 'di la zhugs pa'i rnal 'byor @360a * //
T02TD1345E:360a-1: pa dag / sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang chen dag gis //
T02TD1345E:360a-2: lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i thig le la 'jug pa bshad par bya'o //
T02TD1345E:360a-3: de la re zhig dang por sku'i gsang chen brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1345E:360a-4: 'dir bya ba'i rgyud la zhugs pa ltar tha dad par snang ba'i lha yi dmigs pa ni mi bya'i //
T02TD1345E:360a-5: gang la bdag tu brtags shing mi gsang bar brtags pa'i lus 'di nyid kho na la lhar dmigs par bya'o //
T02TD1345E:360a-7: myur du yongs su dag par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02TD1345E:360a-8: tha dad pa ni de las bzlog pa'o //
T02TD1345E:360a-10: rnal 'byor yang dag ma yin sems //
T02TD1345E:360a-11: lha la dmigs par byed pa dag / rnal 'byor gzugs brnyan rang bzhin te //
T02TD1345E:360a-12: lugs ma la sogs rnal 'byor skye //
T02TD1345E:360a-13: yang dag mchog sems rnal 'byor skye //
T02TD1345E:360a-14: lha la dmigs par byed pa dag / rang gi dam tshig bdag sbyor bas //
T02TD1345E:360a-17: ci'i phyir dang po'i dmigs pa dor zhe na //
T02TD1345E:360a-18: 'di ni dam pa'i bsgrub pa ste //
T02TD1345E:360a-20: tha mal rnam rtog gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02TD1345E:360a-21: rang la lha yi ngar 'dzin bya //
T02TD1345E:360a-24: de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos /
T02TD1345E:360a-25: bcom ldan 'das kyis bde ba chen po so sor gsungs pa thos nas /
T02TD1345E:360a-26: ched du brjod pa'i ched du brjod do //
T02TD1345E:360a-27: tha mal rnam rtog gzhom don du //
T02TD1345E:360a-28: yang dag bsgom pa rab grags kyi //
T02TD1345E:360a-29: tha mal gnas skabs choms nas ni //
T02TD1345E:360a-30: sgom pa'ang bsgom par mi bya'o //
T02TD1345E:360a-31: byang chub sems dpa'i da ni de lta'o //
T02TD1345E:360a-32: de de lta mod kyi 'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i lus 'di sbyangs la sangs rgyas kyi skur rnam par bsgom par bya'o zhes so //
T02TD1345E:360a-33: thabs gang zhig gis 'di bsgom par bya /
T02TD1345E:360a-34: 'dir ni skyes nas drod gsher dang /
T02TD1345E:360a-37: rdzus te 'byung ba dag gis bsgom mo //
T02TD1345E:360a-38: ji ltar 'gro ba dang 'dren pa nyid do //
T02TD1345E:360a-39: brjod pa mi 'dra ba nyid kyis bstan te /
T02TD1345E:360a-40: rnal 'byor rnam gsum zhes bya ste /
T02TD1345E:360a-41: byin gyis brlabs dang yongs brtag dang //
T02TD1345E:360a-42: gzugs nyid yongs su rdzogs pa dag / rnal 'byor yin zhes sangs rgyas gsung //
T02TD1345E:360a-43: de bzhin du dang po dam tshig byin gyis brlab pa'o /
T02TD1345E:360b-0: @360b rnal 'byor spyod pa dag gis brtags //
T02TD1345E:360b-1: dbu ma yongs su rdzogs pa dag / rnal 'byor gyi ni cho gar bshad //
T02TD1345E:360b-3: 'di ni rim pa las ma 'das pas bsgom ste /
T02TD1345E:360b-5: dang po'i las can rnal 'byor pa //
T02TD1345E:360b-6: de sprul sku la goms par bya //
T02TD1345E:360b-7: sprul pa'i sku ni brtan gyur nas //
T02TD1345E:360b-8: longs spyod rdzogs pa brtan par bsgom //
T02TD1345E:360b-9: sprul pa'i sku ni gsal gyur cig / longs spyod rdzogs pa gsal tsam na //
T02TD1345E:360b-10: chos sku dmigs pa med pa ste //
T02TD1345E:360b-13: rim pa gnyis kyang de bzhin te /
T02TD1345E:360b-14: ji skad du slob dpon dombi pas bshad pa /
T02TD1345E:360b-15: bskyed pa'i rim pa bsgom pa blo bzangs kyis //
T02TD1345E:360b-16: rtag tu dang po nyid du bya ba ste //
T02TD1345E:360b-17: phyag rgya sngags ni rnam par dag tsam dang //
T02TD1345E:360b-18: cho ga thams cad brjod par bya ba min //
T02TD1345E:360b-19: phyi nas khyad par ldan zhing bde blag tu //
T02TD1345E:360b-20: yud tsam re res de nyid sems gcig na //
T02TD1345E:360b-21: srid pa 'jig pa'i rdzogs rim bsgom pa ni //
T02TD1345E:360b-22: lhan cig skyes pa rtag tu bsam par bya //
T02TD1345E:360b-24: 'di ni thams cad du gnas pa ma yin pa ste /
T02TD1345E:360b-26: tha mal rnam pa gzhom don du //
T02TD1345E:360b-27: rang la lha yi ngar 'dzin bya //
T02TD1345E:360b-28: ngar 'dzin de yang gzhom pa'i phyir //
T02TD1345E:360b-29: dmigs pa med pa rnam par bsgom //
T02TD1345E:360b-30: gang tshe sems ni mnyam gnas pa //
T02TD1345E:360b-31: de tshe de nyid yin par nges //
T02TD1345E:360b-34: tha mal rnam pa gzhom don du //
T02TD1345E:360b-35: yang dag bsgom par rab grags kyi //
T02TD1345E:360b-36: tha mal gnas skabs choms nas ni //
T02TD1345E:360b-37: sgom pa'ang bsgom par mi bya'o //
T02TD1345E:360b-39: thogs pa med pas 'di gnas te //
T02TD1345E:360b-41: phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa /
T02TD1345E:360b-42: bcom ldan 'das lus dang ldan par bsgom pa 'di la dgos pa ci mchis /
T02TD1345E:360b-43: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1345E:360b-44: gsang ba'i bdag po dgos pa yod do //
T02TD1345E:360b-45: bcom ldan 'das mtshan ci skad ces bgyi ba mchis //
T02TD1345E:360b-46: rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1345E:360b-47: sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid ces bya ba'o //
T02TD1345E:360b-48: sangs rgyas kyi de kho na nyid ces bgyi pa de ji lta bu /
T02TD1345E:360b-49: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
T02TD1345E:361a-2: de ni de bzhin du bden no //
T02TD1345E:361a-4: rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1345E:361a-5: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T02TD1345E:361a-6: dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'i sku 'di ni nga yin no //
T02TD1345E:361a-8: yul rnams kyis rgyus nga bsgrub par bya ba yin pas na'o //
T02TD1345E:361a-9: phyag na rdo rjes yang gsol pa /
T02TD1345E:361a-11: rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1345E:361a-12: nga ni me long lta bu'i ye shes so //
T02TD1345E:361a-13: me long lta bu'i ye shes de ji lta bu /
T02TD1345E:361a-14: rdo rje 'dzin gyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1345E:361a-15: de bden pa yang ma yin zhing brdzun pa yang ma yin la /
T02TD1345E:361a-16: blang bar bya ba yang min la dor bar bya ba yang min no //
T02TD1345E:361a-17: de bzhin du mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyang nga'o //
T02TD1345E:361a-18: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyang nga'o //
T02TD1345E:361a-19: bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes kyang nga'o //
T02TD1345E:361a-20: de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyang nga'o //
T02TD1345E:361a-21: de bas na byang chub sems dpa' chen po byang chub 'di /
T02TD1345E:361a-22: dngos po med pa de skad du ma smra shig / dngos po med nyid dngos po 'ang nga //
T02TD1345E:361a-23: de bzhin gshegs par gdod nas grol //
T02TD1345E:361a-24: mchog gi sku dang ldan pa ste //
T02TD1345E:361a-25: zab cing rgya che'i sku mnga' ba //
T02TD1345E:361a-26: he ru ka nga'o sems dpa' che //
T02TD1345E:361a-27: bdag med ma dang thabs cig sbyor //
T02TD1345E:361a-28: bde chen nga ni bems po min //
T02TD1345E:361a-29: 'jig rten gzhug phyir bems po nga zhes //
T02TD1345E:361a-31: gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ji lta ba //
T02TD1345E:361a-32: de bzhin bsgom bya'i dngos gang yang //
T02TD1345E:361a-33: stong zhing snang med gnas mchog ste //
T02TD1345E:361a-34: de tshe sdig dang bsod nams med //
T02TD1345E:361a-35: dper na chu nang zla ba ni //
T02TD1345E:361a-36: grogs dag bden min brdzun pa'ang min //
T02TD1345E:361a-38: dang zhing gsal ba'i ngo bo'o //
T02TD1345E:361a-41: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba rm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
T02TD1345E:361a-43: 'di ni med pa las brtags pa tsam ma yin pa ste /
T02TD1345E:361a-45: lha yi sku yi sbyor ba yang //
T02TD1345E:361a-46: skyes tsam nyid nas mngon par gnas //
T02TD1345E:361a-47: kha dog phyag zhal dbyibs 'dra las //
T02TD1345E:361a-48: cung zad rang bzhin bag chags so //
T02TD1345E:361a-51: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02TD1345E:361b-0: sems can sangs @361b rgyas yin pa la //
T02TD1345E:361b-1: cung zad glo bur dri mas bsgribs //
T02TD1345E:361b-2: de bsal ba ni sangs rgyas so //
T02TD1345E:361b-4: 'di yi bsgrub pa nyid ci gang gi tshe mngon sum du gyur pa kho na'o //
T02TD1345E:361b-5: 'di ni sku'i gsang chen mngon par brjod pa'o /
T02TD1345E:361b-7: // / da ni gsung gi gsang chen mngon par brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1345E:361b-8: sku'i gsang chen la gnas pa de'i ngag gi gnas su yi ge hr'i: dmar po las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa bsams la /
T02TD1345E:361b-9: lce'i 'dab ma la yi ge h'um dkar po las rdo rje dkar po bsams te /
T02TD1345E:361b-10: aom badzra dzi hva zhes pas byin gyis brlabs la /
T02TD1345E:361b-11: de nyid du de thim pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du mos pa bskyed de /
T02TD1345E:361b-13: rdo rje'i brjod pas rang gi bla ma'i gdams ngag dang mthun pa'i bzlas pa bya'o //
T02TD1345E:361b-14: de la khro bo'i brjod pa ni /
T02TD1345E:361b-15: sprin byung 'brug sgra yi ge h'um //
T02TD1345E:361b-16: zab mo rdo rje'i tshig brtan pa //
T02TD1345E:361b-17: khro bo gsal ba khro chen po'o //
T02TD1345E:361b-18: rdo rje'i tshig ces grub pa'o //
T02TD1345E:361b-21: lce rtse shin tu mi bskul zhing //
T02TD1345E:361b-22: so dang mchu gnyis 'byar byas pa //
T02TD1345E:361b-23: rtog pa kun la sbyar ba ste //
T02TD1345E:361b-24: rdo rje'i brjod pa sgra yangs pa'o //
T02TD1345E:361b-26: de yang thun mong gi yan lag ni /
T02TD1345E:361b-27: rtog pa kun las btus pa las gsungs pa /
T02TD1345E:361b-28: bzlas brjod byed tshe khro mi bya //
T02TD1345E:361b-29: yul gyi bdag nyid dga' mi bya //
T02TD1345E:361b-30: zhum dang mi dga' 'jigs pa dang //
T02TD1345E:361b-31: 'jungs dang nga rgyal yongs su spang //
T02TD1345E:361b-32: zlos tshe ci yang mi bsam zhing //
T02TD1345E:361b-34: kun rtog rlung gis bskyod nas ni //
T02TD1345E:361b-35: ci yang rung ba mi bsam mo //
T02TD1345E:361b-36: rig sngags lha ni ma gtogs pa //
T02TD1345E:361b-37: sgom pa mchog tu gyur pa yang //
T02TD1345E:361b-38: zlos pas bzlas brjod byed pa'i tshe //
T02TD1345E:361b-39: kun rtog bzung nas mi bsam mo //
T02TD1345E:361b-41: de ltar zhugs pa des ci tsam gyi dngos grub tu 'gyur /
T02TD1345E:361b-42: phreng ba las ltos pa ni /
T02TD1345E:361b-43: mkhas pas gsang sngags yi ge ni //
T02TD1345E:361b-44: bco lnga man chad grangs rnams la //
T02TD1345E:361b-45: yi ge'i sdom ni du yod pa //
T02TD1345E:361b-46: de snyed 'bum phrag bzlas brjod bya //
T02TD1345E:361b-47: yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis la //
T02TD1345E:361b-48: bzlas brjod sum 'bum bya bar bshad //
T02TD1345E:361b-49: yi ge de las lhag pa las //
T02TD1345E:362a-2: sngon du bsnyen pa med par yang //
T02TD1345E:362a-5: gang du dus la ltos pa ni //
T02TD1345E:362a-6: rdzogs ldan dus su yi ge 'bum bzlas te //
T02TD1345E:362a-7: gnyis ldan dus kyi sngags pas 'bum phrag gnyis //
T02TD1345E:362a-8: gsum ldan dus su de nyid gsum du 'gyur //
T02TD1345E:362a-9: bye ba phrag sum 'bum bzhi rtsod dus sbyar //
T02TD1345E:362a-12: rgyud la lar ni ci nas sngags bye ba bzlas par gsungs so //
T02TD1345E:362a-13: bsod nams 'bring po rnams kyis 'bum bzlas par bdag smra'o //
T02TD1345E:362a-14: bsod nams che bas khri bzlas pas shin tu myur bar 'grub po //
T02TD1345E:362a-15: de ltar rdo rje can chen po rgyud kyi bdag pos gsungs so //
T02TD1345E:362a-16: bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis ni bye ba bzlas par gsungs so //
T02TD1345E:362a-17: sems can 'bad rtsol chung ba rnams kyis ni 'bum bzlas par bdag smra'o //
T02TD1345E:362a-18: sems can bsgom pa la gzhol ba rnams kyis ni khri kho na bzlas par bya'o //
T02TD1345E:362a-19: sems can 'dod chags la zhugs pa rnams kyi sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags /
T02TD1345E:362a-20: blun pa dang lkugs pa'i rigs can rnams kyi sngags kyi grangs ji ltar lags //
T02TD1345E:362a-21: shin tu dmigs pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags /
T02TD1345E:362a-22: 'di ltar phan tshun smra bas bzlas na dngos grub gzhan du 'gyur ro //
T02TD1345E:362a-23: gal te man pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs bzhin pas bzlas na /
T02TD1345E:362a-24: bskal pa skar ma lta bu bye bar yang de la dngos grub med do zhes gsungs so //
T02TD1345E:362a-26: bya ba nges pa thob pa nyid do //
T02TD1345E:362a-27: 'di ni gsung gi gsang chen mngon par brjod pa'o /
T02TD1345E:362a-29: // / da ni thugs kyi gsang chen brjod par bya ste /
T02TD1345E:362a-30: sngar bshad pa'i sku dang gsung gsang ba chen po la gnas pa des /
T02TD1345E:362a-31: dngos po thams cad dang bral zhing //
T02TD1345E:362a-32: phung pho khams dang skye mched dang //
T02TD1345E:362a-33: gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs pa //
T02TD1345E:362a-34: chos bdag med pa mnyam pa nyid //
T02TD1345E:362a-35: rang sems gzod nas ma skyes pa //
T02TD1345E:362a-36: stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02TD1345E:362b-0: 'di yang gang rig pa'i rjes su @362b 'gro ba ni /
T02TD1345E:362b-1: 'phags pa n'a ga rdzu na'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa'i dbu ma las grub pa'o //
T02TD1345E:362b-2: thabs kyi rjes su 'brang ba dag gis ni /
T02TD1345E:362b-7: rdo rje nor bu'i nang dang /
T02TD1345E:362b-8: rig ma la brten pa dang /
T02TD1345E:362b-10: rjes su 'dzin pa dag gi 'grub po //
T02TD1345E:362b-11: bgrang dang rjes su 'gro dang gnas //
T02TD1345E:362b-12: mtshan nyid de nas rnam ldog dang //
T02TD1345E:362b-13: yongs su dag pa nyid dang drug /'di ni 'ong ba gzung bar dran //
T02TD1345E:362b-14: 'dir thun mong min pa sbyar ba rlung las grub pa'o //
T02TD1345E:362b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsreg cing //
T02TD1345E:362b-17: spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te //
T02TD1345E:362b-18: bsregs pas ham las zla ba 'bab //
T02TD1345E:362b-22: thig le sgra ni rnam spangs pa'o //
T02TD1345E:362b-24: thig le dang phra mo dag gi 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1345E:362b-25: chu bo'am lteng ka'i chu ni dri med dag la zla ba gnas pa ltar //
T02TD1345E:362b-26: de bzhin de la rim gyis 'jig pa rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu bsam //
T02TD1345E:362b-27: me long la ni rlung dag rim gyis zar pa bzhin du'ang blta bya ste //
T02TD1345E:362b-28: ril por 'dzin pa la bya ba'i rim pa 'di ni de bzhin rab tu brtag ces bya ba ni /
T02TD1345E:362b-29: rdo rje nor bu'i nang du rtogs pa'i 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1345E:362b-30: rdo rje nyi ma nub pa na //
T02TD1345E:362b-31: bsgrub pa kun du brtsam par bya //
T02TD1345E:362b-32: skya rengs 'char ba'i dus dag tu //
T02TD1345E:362b-35: rig ma la brten pas 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1345E:362b-36: ril por 'dzin pa rjes su gzhig pa ni /
T02TD1345E:362b-37: chu bo'am lteng ka'i chu ni zhes bya ba la sogs pa sngar 'das ma thag pas 'grub pa'o //
T02TD1345E:362b-38: 'di dag ni shes rab ye shes la brten pas 'grub la /
T02TD1345E:362b-39: gsang ba gnyis ni bum pa'i dang gsang ba'i dbang las 'byung ba'o //
T02TD1345E:362b-40: yong ni thugs kyi gsang chen ma grub par nyon mongs pa mi 'gog la /
T02TD1345E:362b-41: de la ma 'gags na sku dang gsung gi gsang chen mi 'grub ste /
T02TD1345E:362b-43: yab gcig lha rnams thugs rje med dam ci //
T02TD1345E:362b-44: da lta'i sems can shin tu 'grub par dka' //
T02TD1345E:363a-0: bu gcig lha rnams thugs rje'i @363a * //
T02TD1345E:363a-2: ding sang sems can nyon mongs dra bas khyab //
T02TD1345E:363a-4: thugs kyi gsang chen nyid du sku'i gsang chen dang gsung gi gsang chen yang 'jug ste /
T02TD1345E:363a-6: zla 'od gzhon nur gyur pas 'phags pa zla ba'i sgron ma las bshad pa /
T02TD1345E:363a-7: nam mkha' 'dra zhing rdul bral gzugs bzang 'char //
T02TD1345E:363a-8: shes rab sras po lus dang mtshan mi mnga' //
T02TD1345E:363a-9: yon tan rgya mtsho rab zab thugs rje can //
T02TD1345E:363a-10: mtshungs med phyag ni bdag gi spyi bor zhog / ces pa'o //
T02TD1345E:363a-11: de bzhin du gzhan las kyang /
T02TD1345E:363a-12: 'jig rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsung //
T02TD1345E:363a-13: ye shes rgya mtsho de thos na //
T02TD1345E:363a-14: de dag dri med bde ba 'thob //
T02TD1345E:363a-18: gsang sngags bzlas brjod mi bya ste //
T02TD1345E:363a-19: dka' thub sbyin sreg ma yin no //
T02TD1345E:363a-21: de yi gsang sngags bzlas pa dang //
T02TD1345E:363a-22: de yi dka' thub sbyin sreg ni //
T02TD1345E:363a-23: sems ni mdo ru bsdus tshul lo //
T02TD1345E:363a-25: mtshan mar bcas pas mtshan bcas kyi //
T02TD1345E:363a-26: dngos grub rgyal ba dam par bzhed //
T02TD1345E:363a-27: mtshan ma med la gnas pas ni //
T02TD1345E:363a-28: mtshan par bcas pa 'grub tu rung //
T02TD1345E:363a-29: de bas rnam pa thams cad du //
T02TD1345E:363a-30: mtshan ma med la gnas par bya //
T02TD1345E:363a-31: zhes gsungs pas na grub pa gsum char gyi thugs gsang bas 'thob pa yang ngo //
T02TD1345E:363a-32: gang gis thugs gsang chen ma shes par gnas pa de ni /
T02TD1345E:363a-33: dbugs ma phyin par gnas pa ste /
T02TD1345E:363a-35: gang gis stong pa ma mthong ba //
T02TD1345E:363a-36: de dag 'khor zhing nyam nga zhes so //
T02TD1345E:363a-38: stong pa'i chos kyis mi mkhas gang 'jigs pa /
T02TD1345E:363a-39: de dag sangs rgyas byang chub ring po yin //
T02TD1345E:363a-40: stong nyid chos la the tshom su med pa //
T02TD1345E:363a-41: de dag sangs rgyas byang chub 'thob par 'gyur //
T02TD1345E:363a-43: de bzhin du 'phags pa n'a g'a rdzu nas bshad pa /
T02TD1345E:363a-44: gang gis stong nyid mi shes pa //
T02TD1345E:363a-45: de la thar pa'i skal med de //
T02TD1345E:363a-46: 'gro drug srid pa'i bco na ra ru //
T02TD1345E:363b-0: de bzhin @363b du gang gis thugs gsang chen ma shes pa des ni /
T02TD1345E:363b-1: sangs rgyas mthong ba ma yin te /
T02TD1345E:363b-3: ji ltar mthong bzhin su blta ba //
T02TD1345E:363b-4: de dag 'dren pa mi mthong ngo //
T02TD1345E:363b-5: rnam par rtog pa mi 'jug cing //
T02TD1345E:363b-6: gang tshe sangs rgyas mi mthong la //
T02TD1345E:363b-7: 'jug med sangs rgyas yin par ni //
T02TD1345E:363b-8: gal te mthong na de sangs rgyas //
T02TD1345E:363b-11: de ltar skye 'jig spangs pa yis //
T02TD1345E:363b-12: thub pa zhi ba sus mthong ba //
T02TD1345E:363b-13: de dag 'di dang slad mar yang //
T02TD1345E:363b-14: chags med nyer len med par 'gyur //
T02TD1345E:363b-17: gang zag med cing phung po med //
T02TD1345E:363b-18: sangs rgyas ye shes zag med pa //
T02TD1345E:363b-19: rtag tu zhi ba rnam bsgoms te //
T02TD1345E:363b-20: de la bdag ni skyabs su mchi //
T02TD1345E:363b-23: gang gis nga la sgrar shes shing //
T02TD1345E:363b-24: gang gis nga la gzugs su mthong //
T02TD1345E:363b-25: log par spong bar zhugs pa ste //
T02TD1345E:363b-26: skye bo de dag nga mi mthong //
T02TD1345E:363b-27: sangs rgyas rnams ni chos nyid lta //
T02TD1345E:363b-28: 'dren pa rnams ni chos kyi sku //
T02TD1345E:363b-29: chos nyid shes par bya min pas //
T02TD1345E:363b-30: de ni rnam par shes mi nus //
T02TD1345E:363b-33: rtag tu skye mched chos ni de bzhin gshegs //
T02TD1345E:363b-34: chos rnams thams cad bde bar gshegs dang 'dra //
T02TD1345E:363b-35: byis pa'i blo can mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnams //
T02TD1345E:363b-36: 'jig rten dag na med pa'i chos la spyod //
T02TD1345E:363b-39: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos kyi sku yin gyis /
T02TD1345E:363b-40: dge slong dag 'jig tshogs la skur ma 'dzin pa /
T02TD1345E:363b-41: dge slong dag nga ni chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs par ltos shig / ces gsungs te /
T02TD1345E:363b-42: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ni yang dag pa'i mtha' rtog pa 'di lta ste /
T02TD1345E:363b-43: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par blta'o zhes so //
T02TD1345E:363b-45: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gzugs kyi skur mi blta ste /
T02TD1345E:363b-46: de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos kyi sku'o //
T02TD1345E:363b-47: rigs kyi bu chos nyid ni 'ong ba 'am 'gro ba med de /
T02TD1345E:363b-48: rigs kyi bu de bzhin du /
T02TD1345E:363b-49: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la byon pa'am bzhud pa med do zhes so //
T02TD1345E:363b-51: gang gis sangs rgyas spyan drangs shing //
T02TD1345E:364a-2: rdo rje sems dpa' byon pa dang //
T02TD1345E:364a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa rnams //
T02TD1345E:364a-4: gang na 'ang yod pa ma yin no //
T02TD1345E:364a-5: dri ma med cing dag pa'i lus //
T02TD1345E:364a-6: gang gis spyan drangs gshegs su gsol //
T02TD1345E:364a-7: de nyid kyis ni rtag med par //
T02TD1345E:364a-8: de bzhin gshegs la phyag bya'o //
T02TD1345E:364a-11: chos kyi sku la gnas pa nyid dang /
T02TD1345E:364a-12: grub pa'i skyes bur gyur pa na'o //
T02TD1345E:364a-13: 'di ni thugs kyi gsang chen mngon par brjod pa'o //
T02TD1345E:364a-14: da ni gsang ba gsum las byung ba'i 'bras bu brjod de /
T02TD1345E:364a-16: chu rgyus dra ba dang bcas shing //
T02TD1345E:364a-17: yan lag kun ldan bu ga can //
T02TD1345E:364a-18: lus de med par snang gyur pa //
T02TD1345E:364a-19: de yi skad cig de la ni //
T02TD1345E:364a-21: nam mkha' ji bzhin dmigs med cing //
T02TD1345E:364a-22: mtshan ma med cing skye ba med //
T02TD1345E:364a-23: sna tshogs rnam bral sgrib lnga spangs //
T02TD1345E:364a-24: sangs rgyas dngos rnams dang bral ba //
T02TD1345E:364a-25: me long gzugs brnyan ji bzhin du //
T02TD1345E:364a-26: de'i bdag nyid du rab snang ba //
T02TD1345E:364a-27: he ru ka yi dngos po gsal //
T02TD1345E:364a-28: 'di nyid dbang po yul rnams dang //
T02TD1345E:364a-29: phur po gnas pa mkha' dang mnyam //
T02TD1345E:364a-30: bden nyid 'dir rab skye lus te //
T02TD1345E:364a-31: 'dus byas don gyis gzhan min pas //
T02TD1345E:364a-32: mig gis gzugs ni 'dzin med cing //
T02TD1345E:364a-33: rna ba yis ni sgra min no //
T02TD1345E:364a-34: lce yis kyang ni ro mi tshor //
T02TD1345E:364a-35: sna yis kyang ni dril min //
T02TD1345E:364a-36: lus kyi gong bus reg med de //
T02TD1345E:364a-37: bde ba chen po'i gzugs phyir na'o //
T02TD1345E:364a-38: bud med mchog mthong las bde zhing //
T02TD1345E:364a-39: glu thos las kyang yang dag bde //
T02TD1345E:364a-40: dri zhim ma las bde ba che //
T02TD1345E:364a-41: skye gnas reg las kyang bde che //
T02TD1345E:364a-42: ro mchog btung ba'i rab sbyor ba'i //
T02TD1345E:364a-43: bde ba dag ni su yis bzlog / ces so //
T02TD1345E:364a-44: don 'di nyid ni rim pa lnga pa las kyang bshad de /
T02TD1345E:364a-45: ji ltar dang ba'i chu dag las //
T02TD1345E:364a-46: nya ni myur du ldang ba ltar //
T02TD1345E:364a-47: de bzhin thams cad stong gsal las //
T02TD1345E:364a-50: da ni 'di ltar gyur pa de'i mtshan ma bstan pa lung la 'jug par bya ste //
T02TD1345E:364a-51: ji skad du dpal yang dag sbyor ba'i thig le'i phreng ba las gsungs pa /
T02TD1345E:364b-0: de nas gang du rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa der @364b 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa 'byung ste /
T02TD1345E:364b-1: sa 'di dga' zhing mgu la rangs pas rnam pa drug tu g-yos pa /
T02TD1345E:364b-2: bdud kyi gnas su cha lang lta bu'i sgra grags pa dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-3: phyogs bcur bskal pa'i me 'bar ba lta bu'i skar mda' ltung ba dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-4: rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs pa'i sgra dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-5: thams cad du gnam rdo ltung ba dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-6: de nyid bskal pa'i me'i gzugs lta bu'i ye shes kyi snang ba 'bar ba dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-7: phyag rgya'i skye gnas kun du khams gsum thams cad snang ba dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-10: chu bdag dang brgya byin dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-22: chu 'byung ba la sogs pa gang yin pa dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-23: gzhan yang sum cu rtsa gsum du gnas pa'i lha rnams der 'ongs nas yang dag par dga' bas me tog gis mchod par byed do //
T02TD1345E:364b-32: rdza rngas nam mkhar gnas te rtag tu mchod par byed do //
T02TD1345E:364b-34: rigs 'dzin gyi rgyal po'i bu mo thams cad kyis gar byed pa dang sil snyan du ma byed pa dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-36: gnod sbyin gyis glu len par byed cing /
T02TD1345E:364b-37: de la dga' ba dang bcas pas /
T02TD1345E:364b-38: rgyal ba rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i sgras rtag tu rol pa byed pa dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-39: gang gis grub pa la nam mkhar gnas pa'i lha rnams kyis ni legs pa'i rnam pa rab tu gsol bar byed do //
T02TD1345E:364b-40: dga' ldan du gnas pa'i lha rab mchog gang yin pa dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-41: lha'i bu gang yin pa dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-43: 'og min gyi bar dag 'ongs nas phyag 'tshal zhing me tog sna tshogs kyi dri'i char dang /
T02TD1345E:364b-44: bdug pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par gyis //
T02TD1345E:364b-45: gus pa'i tshul gyis mchod par byed de //
T02TD1345E:364b-46: gzhan yang khyod la rgyas par bshad pa'i tshul gyis ci zhig bya ste /
T02TD1345E:364b-47: bsgrub par byas pa'i bsod nams kyis khams gsum gyi gang zhig mchod pa de rnams kyis mchod par byed do //
T02TD1345E:364b-49: rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa ni //
T02TD1345E:365a-2: gnas la the tshom 'di rnams ni //
T02TD1345E:365a-3: bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol //
T02TD1345E:365a-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa //
T02TD1345E:365a-5: rig ma'i skyes bu grub pa ni //
T02TD1345E:365a-7: gang du yang mi gnas so //
T02TD1345E:365a-18: sems can thams cad kyi sems la gnas pa /
T02TD1345E:365a-19: sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba /
T02TD1345E:365a-20: yon tan thams cad kyis brgyan par byas pa /
T02TD1345E:365a-22: zhi ba mnyam pa med pa /
T02TD1345E:365a-25: kun du rtog pa spangs pa /
T02TD1345E:365a-28: rgyal ba'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir rgyal po /
T02TD1345E:365a-29: phyed par dka' ba'i phyir rdo rje /
T02TD1345E:365a-30: nyon mongs pa'i nye bar gdung ba las grol ba'i phyir zla ba /
T02TD1345E:365a-31: 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir seng ge / gtir dpag dka' ba'i phyir chu'i phung po'o //
T02TD1345E:365a-32: de ltar dpe sna tshogs kyis rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi dper bya'o //
T02TD1345E:365a-33: de nyid ni gcig pu ste /
T02TD1345E:365a-34: sems can thams cad rnams kyi don byed pa dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-35: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs kyang /
T02TD1345E:365a-37: khab nas mngon par 'byung ba dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-38: gzhon nu'i rol rtsed mdzed pa dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-39: rdo rje gdan gyis mnan pa dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-40: bdud btul ba mnyam med pa dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-41: dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bstan pa dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-42: lha las babs pa nyams dga' ba dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-43: shin tu sna tshogs pa'i cho 'phrul dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-44: glang chen nor skyong btul ba dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-45: skal ba dang ldan pa'i skye bo dag gzhug pa dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-46: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-47: bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed ltos pa med pa dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-48: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo 'dul ba dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-49: byang chub sems dpa'i rgyal tshab nyid dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-50: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T02TD1345E:365a-51: khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po chen po ste /
T02TD1345E:365a-52: rigs kyi bu de ltar 'di lta bu'i khyad par du ma rmi lam lta bur sangs rgyas kyi rol pa mchog ston par mdzad do //
T02TD1345E:365a-53: grub pa gang yin pa ni sgyu ma'i tshul gyis 'gro ba thams cad kyi don mdzad do //
T02TD1345E:365b-0: 'di ni gsang ba @365b gsum las byung ba'i 'bras bu mngon par brjod pa'o //
T02TD1345E:365b-1: yong ye gang zhig 'jig rten las ma chags pa des 'di 'grub ste /
T02TD1345E:365b-2: slob dpon 'phags pa lhas kyang tha na rgyal srid kyi bde ba la yang mi chags par bya zhes bshad la /
T02TD1345E:365b-3: dpal sh'akya thub pa mngon par bskul ba las kyang /
T02TD1345E:365b-4: gang lha rnams kyis smras pa /
T02TD1345E:365b-5: na tshod thog mar gzugs mchog 'dzin pa'i tshe //
T02TD1345E:365b-6: phongs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod //
T02TD1345E:365b-7: rga na sdug bsngal gzi brjid lus bcom na //
T02TD1345E:365b-8: rnam par spong sti ri dgas klung skam bzhin //
T02TD1345E:365b-9: nor 'bru dam pa rdzas mang stobs ldan tshe //
T02TD1345E:365b-10: phongs shing sdug 'dod 'di ni byis pa'i spyod /
T02TD1345E:365b-11: nor nyams sdug bsngal bar ni gyur pa'i tshe //
T02TD1345E:365b-12: rnam par spong tshe mi yis 'phrog stong bzhin //
T02TD1345E:365b-13: ji ltar me tog shing dang 'bras bcas shing //
T02TD1345E:365b-14: de bzhin sbyin 'dod ma la dga' bar byed //
T02TD1345E:365b-15: nor nyams sdug bsngal nyen cing spang pas na //
T02TD1345E:365b-16: de tshe dga' bar mi 'gyur bya rgod bzhin /
T02TD1345E:365b-17: rdzas ldan gzugs mchog ldan tshe dpon po bzhin //
T02TD1345E:365b-18: phrad na sdug cing dbang po dga' bar byed //
T02TD1345E:365b-19: rga na sdug bsngal nyen cing nor zad na //
T02TD1345E:365b-20: de tshe 'dod par mi 'gyur 'chi bdag bzhin //
T02TD1345E:365b-21: rga bas rgas byas na tshod yal 'gyur na //
T02TD1345E:365b-22: sdong po gnam lcags kyis ni bcom pa bzhin //
T02TD1345E:365b-23: rga bas 'khogs na 'jigs bcas khang rul 'dra //
T02TD1345E:365b-24: rga las 'byung ba thub pa myur du smros //
T02TD1345E:365b-25: skyes pa bud med tshogs rnams rga pas skems //
T02TD1345E:365b-26: ma lu'i khri shing s'a la'i nags stug bzhin //
T02TD1345E:365b-29: srid gsum mi brtan ston ka'i sprin dang 'dra //
T02TD1345E:365b-30: 'gro ba'i skye 'chi gang la blta dang mtshungs //
T02TD1345E:365b-31: 'gro ba'i tshe 'gro nam mkha'i glog 'dra ste //
T02TD1345E:365b-32: ri gzar 'bab chu lta bur myur mgyogs 'gro //
T02TD1345E:365b-35: nang med mi rtag tshe ring rtag ma yin //
T02TD1345E:365b-36: la nga tsho mi rtag 'byor pa rtag ma yin //
T02TD1345E:365b-38: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus bshad pa la yang /
T02TD1345E:365b-39: grogs dag tshe 'di mi rtag myur 'gro ste //
T02TD1345E:365b-40: ri gzar chu dag mgyogs 'dra na //
T02TD1345E:365b-41: byis pa skye bos mi shes te //
T02TD1345E:365b-42: mi mkhas gzugs kyi dregs pas myos //
T02TD1345E:365b-44: 'phags pa nda g'a rdzu nas kyang //
T02TD1345E:366a-1: ltar 'di kun mi rtag bdag med de //
T02TD1345E:366a-2: skyabs med mgon med gnas med de slad du //
T02TD1345E:366a-3: 'khor ba chu shing snying po med pa la //
T02TD1345E:366a-4: mi mchog khyod kyi thugs ni 'byung bar mdzod //
T02TD1345E:366a-6: gang dbang thob pa yang ste /
T02TD1345E:366a-7: gsang ba'i mdzod las gsungs pa /
T02TD1345E:366a-8: dbang bskur yang dag sbyin ldan na //
T02TD1345E:366a-9: skye dang skye bar dbang bskur 'gyur //
T02TD1345E:366a-10: de yi skye ba bdun la ni //
T02TD1345E:366a-11: ma bsgrubs par ni dngos grub thob //
T02TD1345E:366a-12: gang yang bsgom pa dang ldan zhing //
T02TD1345E:366a-13: gal te dam tshig sdom la gnas //
T02TD1345E:366a-14: skye 'dir las dbang gis ma grub //
T02TD1345E:366a-15: skye ba gzhan du dngos grub 'thob //
T02TD1345E:366a-16: re zhig dam tshig nyams pa la //
T02TD1345E:366a-17: dngos grub thob pa lta zhog gi / mi yi skye ba'ang rnyed par dka' //
T02TD1345E:366a-18: gang yang bla mar brgyud pa yi //
T02TD1345E:366a-19: rim 'ongs de nyid rim pa yis //
T02TD1345E:366a-20: sgrub po de yis 'grub snyam dgongs //
T02TD1345E:366a-22: 'di ni gsang ba gsum 'grub pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo mngon par brjod pa'o //
T02TD1345E:366a-23: gang rab tu dga' ba'i nam mkha' la //
T02TD1345E:366a-24: tsandan me tog bud med bzang //
T02TD1345E:366a-25: mthong ba gang cho 'dzag gyur pa //
T02TD1345E:366a-26: de tshe dga' bar yang dag bshad //
T02TD1345E:366a-27: sems can kun la rnam par gnas //
T02TD1345E:366a-28: sems can de dag kun gyi sems //
T02TD1345E:366a-29: dpag dka' skad cig nyid las shes //
T02TD1345E:366a-30: zhes gsungs pa ni bdag gis ma bkag ste /
T02TD1345E:366a-31: longs spyod spyad par ma gsungs te /
T02TD1345E:366a-32: 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis spyod pa gsungs //
T02TD1345E:366a-34: yang padmar chags pa'i sems spangs te /
T02TD1345E:366a-35: zhes rgyud dag las bkag pa bstan pa dang bcas pa brjod pa'i phyir dang /
T02TD1345E:366a-36: rgyud las gang gsungs longs spyod ni bdag gis kyang bkag pa med do //
T02TD1345E:366a-37: de ltar gsang chen gsum gyi bdag / mngon par brjod las byung ba yi //
T02TD1345E:366a-38: dge ba bdag la skyes gyur na //
T02TD1345E:366a-39: 'gro ba gsang chen gsum 'jog shog / gsang chen dga' ba'i thig le zhes bya ba /
T02TD1345E:366a-40: slob dpon yu so ma pu rir byung ba'i dge slong dpal ldan byang chub bzang po'i bla ma /
T02TD1345E:366a-41: dpal ma h'a ma ti'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02TD1345E:366a-43: // / rgya gar gyi slob dpon a'a tsarya du lo pa dang /
T02TD1345E:366a-44: bod kyi lo ts'a ba dge slong chos kyi shes rab kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
